author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Increase your critical thinking skills with Brilliant! Start learning for free at https://brilliant.org/sabine/ and get 20% off a premium subscription, which includes daily unlimited access!

Recently, a physicist published a paper claiming that dark matter is the consequence of a mirror universe. What is a mirror universe? Is this idea as far-fetched as it sounds? Or does it actually make sense? Let’s take a look. 

Paper: https://journals.aps.org/prd/abstract/10.1103/vmw2-4k77

title: Is Dark Matter Evidence Of A Mirror Universe?
